title: Coral Solutions AS - Pioneering Additive Manufacturing Optimization
description: As former CEO of Coral Solutions AS, I led groundbreaking advancements in additive manufacturing design, achieving remarkable efficiency and sustainability.

body.raw:
# Coral Solutions AS

![Coral Solutions Team](/coral_1.gif)

As the former CEO of Coral Solutions AS in Bergen, Norway, I played a pivotal role in revolutionizing design for additive manufacturing. My leadership was instrumental in incorporating the latest optimization algorithms and TPMS/lattice structures, creating a more efficient and eco-friendly design-to-production workflow.

## Highlights of My Tenure

### Advanced Design Optimization

![Design Optimization](/coral_2.gif)

During my time, we significantly enhanced our part redesign process with new AI-driven technologies, achieving unprecedented structural integrity, reduced material waste, and optimized performance and costs.

### Next-Gen Automated Product Design

![Automated Workflow](/coral_3.gif)

I led the refinement of our design automation for industrial and medical parts, significantly improving customization and 3D printing capabilities.

### Innovative Part Consolidation

![Part Consolidation](/coral_5.gif)

I oversaw projects that transformed multi-component assemblies into single, more efficient units, significantly reducing costs and enhancing product reliability.

### Cutting-Edge Topology Optimization

![Topology Optimization](/coral_6.png)

Under my guidance, we advanced our techniques in lightweighting parts, maintaining high performance while reducing environmental impact.

### AI-Driven Generative Design

![Generative Design](/coral_7.jpeg)

I championed the use of newer AI models and cloud technologies in generative design, generating a broader array of optimized industrial part designs.

### Digitalization & 3D Printing Frontiers

![Digitalization](/coral_8.png)

I played a key role in helping companies transition to additive manufacturing with our advanced 3D printing solutions.

## Market Dynamics - Hand Wheel

![Market Update](/coral_9.jpeg)

- **Current Types of Wheels:** 1200+
- **Wheels per Installation:** 4000+
- **New Installations:** 40+
- **Updated Market Size (Units):** 160,000

## Past Partnerships

![Partnerships](/coral_10.jpeg)

During my leadership, we collaborated with leading tech firms to enhance our solutions in additive manufacturing.

## Projects & Case Studies from My Era

![Recent Projects](/coral_11.png)

Discover the impactful projects and benchmarks in design and manufacturing efficiency achieved under my leadership.

## Reflecting on My Role

As CEO and Co-Founder from 2019 to 2021, I guided Coral Solutions AS through significant technological breakthroughs and expanded our global impact in the additive manufacturing industry. This experience has been foundational in my ongoing professional journey.
